meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Video Conference

agenda_items.title: Public Speakers for items V- VII
Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes for the January 27, 2025 Senior Affairs Commission Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Chairâ€™s Report
agenda_items.description: Reminder of Texas Open Meetings Act Requirements for Videoconference Meeting and Ad Hoc Committees Guidelines.

agenda_items.title: New Business: Presentation
agenda_items.description: An Introduction and Overview from the Coalition for Aging LGBT. The presentation will explore the needs of LGBT seniors and strategies for fostering inclusivity, equity, and improved support in future senior services.

agenda_items.title: Staff Reports/Briefings
agenda_items.description: Presentation by the Office of Community Care and Empowerment (OCCE) Senior Services. OCCE will provide a monthly update on services provided, programs, and contracts targeting the older residents of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: New Business: Discussion
agenda_items.description: Commissioner Rob Friedman will lead discussion on 2025 Funding Priorities in preparation for the annual SAC memorandum to the City Council.
